column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's delivery from south loop was quick
column3: the pizza has changed.  the once delicious butter crust is now a cracker with a smatter of some red sauce. Worst pizza I've had in a while.  And
column4: I've had it twice now within a month or two time just to be sure this wasn't a trend.  Too bad
column5: have to go back to Beggar's for real pizza.
